steps.content: Drop hints and get more intense over time to build his anticipation. Should I put clothes on too?” “I had the HOTTEST dream about you last night. It’s all I can think about now. 🥵”

steps.content: Find out what he'd like to do with you to get his imagination running wild. steps.title: Guys enjoy the visual stimulation of suggestive photos.
steps.content: Guys enjoy the visual stimulation of suggestive photos. [11] X Research source Remember that a photo doesn’t have to be nude to be sexy. A picture of you in a flattering outfit or underwear will also get a guy excited! [12] X Research source Consider leaving your face out of nude photos. If the photos got out somehow, you still won’t be identified in them. Talk to your guy and agree to delete sexy photos after looking at them. That way, neither of you is holding onto sensitive material.
